actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to require that free lunches be served to all children in schools participating in the school lunch program under such act, to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 for the purpose of terminating the school breakfast program.

summary.text: Requires that free lunches be served to all children in schools participating in the school lunch program under the National School Lunch Act. Terminates the school breakfast program under the Child Nutrition Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to require that free lunches be served to all children in schools participating in the school lunch program under such act, to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 for the purpose of terminating the school breakfast program.
